participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, with a passion for education and a love for animals.
participant_1.background: I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions. I've never been to the west coast of the United States. I did not finish college. I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success. I have two full sleeves of tattoos.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, always looking for new ways to express themselves and connect with others.
participant_2.background: I love to snuggle with my cats and watch funny videos on YouTube. My favorite band used to be Toto. My friends do not call me by my real name. I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood. My favorite hero is Flash.

content.text: I'm doing good, just got back from a long day of teaching. How about you?
I'm doing well, just got done working at my juicing bar.
Oh nice, have you always wanted to run a juicing bar?
Kind of, I've always loved making juices and smoothies. My friends call me "the flash" because I'm always running around making drinks for people.
That's awesome, I'm glad you're doing something you love.
Thanks, me too! Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog named Luna. She's a pitbull mix and she's the best dog ever.
Aww, I love pitbulls! They're such sweet dogs.
They are, and Luna is the perfect example of that. She's always so happy and loving.
I'm sure she's a great companion for you.
She is, I don't know what I would do without her.
Well, it sounds like you have a great life. What are your goals for the future?
I want to keep teaching and eventually become a principal. I love working with kids and helping them learn.
That's awesome, I'm sure you'll be a great principal.
No problem, have a great day!
